attributes.action: Change GCSE 2020 dates due to Ramadan falling on same dates
attributes.additional_details: Gcses shape the future of the youths so why do it on a day which puts Muslims at a disadvantage
attributes.background: Gcses are a hard and stressful time for our youth on top of that society is more secular then it used to be meaning a lot of Muslims are now apart of society - science has proven that eating and being hydrated before a exam dramatically enhances your outcome this cannot be done during Ramadan!

rejection.details: Decisions about the dates of exams are taken by exam boards, not by the UK Government or Parliament.
